s0380.literal: Sixteenth year, dug moats along the river bank.
s0380.idiomatic: Sixteenth year, dug moats along the river bank.

s0381.chinese: 以兵二萬伐大荔，取其王城。
s0381.literal: With 20,000 troops attacked Dali, took its royal city.
s0381.idiomatic: With 20,000 troops attacked Dali, took its royal city.

s0382.literal: Twenty-first year, first established Pinyang county.
s0382.idiomatic: Twenty-first year, first established Pinyang county.

s0384.chinese: 二十四年，晉亂，殺智伯，分其國與趙、韓、魏。
s0384.literal: Twenty-fourth year, Jin disorder, killed Zhi Bo, divided his state among Zhao, Han, Wei.
s0384.idiomatic: Twenty-fourth year, Jin disorder, killed Zhi Bo, divided his state among Zhao, Han, Wei.

s0385.chinese: 二十五年，智開與邑人來奔。
s0385.literal: Twenty-fifth year, Zhi Kai and townspeople came fleeing.
s0385.idiomatic: Twenty-fifth year, Zhi Kai and townspeople came fleeing.

s0386.chinese: 三十三年，伐義渠，虜其王。
s0386.literal: Thirty-third year, attacked Yiqu, captured its king.
s0386.idiomatic: Thirty-third year, attacked Yiqu, captured its king.

s0388.literal: Duke Li Gong died, son Duke Zhao ascended.
s0388.idiomatic: Duke Li Gong died, son Duke Zhao ascended.

s0389.literal: Duke Zhao second year, Nanzheng rebelled.
s0389.idiomatic: Duke Zhao second year, Nanzheng rebelled.

s0390.chinese: 十三年，義渠來伐，至渭南。
s0390.literal: Thirteenth year, Yiqu came to attack, reached south of Wei River.
s0390.idiomatic: Thirteenth year, Yiqu came to attack, reached south of Wei River.

s0391.chinese: 十四年，躁公卒，立其弟懷公。
s0391.literal: Fourteenth year, Duke Zhao died, established his younger brother Duke Hui.
s0391.idiomatic: Fourteenth year, Duke Zhao died, established his younger brother Duke Hui.

s0392.chinese: 懷公四年，庶長朝與大臣圍懷公，懷公自殺。
s0392.literal: Duke Hui fourth year, Senior Grand Master Zhao and ministers surrounded Duke Hui, Duke Hui committed suicide.
s0392.idiomatic: Duke Hui fourth year, Senior Grand Master Zhao and ministers surrounded Duke Hui, Duke Hui committed suicide.

s0393.chinese: 懷公太子曰昭子，蚤死，大臣乃立太子昭子之子，是為靈公。
s0393.literal: Duke Hui's crown prince was called Zhao Zi, died early, ministers then established Crown Prince Zhao Zi's son, this was Duke Ling.
s0393.idiomatic: Duke Hui's crown prince was called Zhao Zi, died early, ministers then established Crown Prince Zhao Zi's son, this was Duke Ling.

s0394.literal: Duke Ling was Duke Hui's grandson.
s0394.idiomatic: Duke Ling was Duke Hui's grandson.

s0395.chinese: 靈公六年，晉城少梁，秦擊之。
s0395.literal: Duke Ling sixth year, Jin fortified Shaoliang, Qin attacked it.
s0395.idiomatic: Duke Ling sixth year, Jin fortified Shaoliang, Qin attacked it.

s0397.chinese: 靈公卒，子獻公不得立，立靈公季父悼子，是為簡公。
s0397.literal: Duke Ling died, son Duke Xian could not ascend, established Duke Ling's youngest uncle Dao Zi, this was Duke Jian.
s0397.idiomatic: Duke Ling died, son Duke Xian could not ascend, established Duke Ling's youngest uncle Dao Zi, this was Duke Jian.

s0398.chinese: 簡公，昭子之弟而懷公子也。
s0398.literal: Duke Jian was Zhao Zi's younger brother and Duke Hui's son.
s0398.idiomatic: Duke Jian was Zhao Zi's younger brother and Duke Hui's son.

s0399.literal: Duke Jian sixth year, first ordered officials to wear swords.
s0399.idiomatic: Duke Jian sixth year, first ordered officials to wear swords.
